page.title: 11Cropwell Bishop, My Day
page.content: {0730}Helen comes in to wake me up. {0745}I come down for breakfast. {0805}I get Dad up.Then I wash my face and clean my teeth and brush my hair. {0815}I check my bag,my purse too,to see if I have enough money for the bus, and if my sandwiches are packed. {0825}I do my piano practice . {0840-0845}Dad gives me a lift to school,drops me off at The Chequers pub,walk up Stockwell Lane to school. {0905}Assembly begins with Mrs Parker. {0945}Assembly ends. I do my maths.{ {1040}Playtime I chat with my friends. {1100}I do my Topic, writing a novel. {1155}We lay the dinner tables. {1200}I play Blockbusters on the computer with Olivia and Angela. {1240}Come in for lunch. {1315}We do P.E or the Alladin Play. AUTHOR:Susan Evans, aged 11yrs. {This diary continued on page 12.
